review: You know this launcher has Team Fortress 2, right?

it's like team fortress 2 but for homosexual people

"a heterosexual man in a homosexual world"
-Reaper 2023

The new patches along with the new character completely break the game and how it "used" to be. Ever since Jeff left it has never been the same. At it's core, it's a great, fun, creative game. But the balancing issues, both character and matchmaking, have made it impossible to play. Blizzard sucked up to some corp suits for extra money and ruined something that was fine. Not to mention fucking sexually harassing and assaulting its workers like it's the 1980s. Blizzard has royally fucked this game in the ass. 

The porn of this game is better than the actual game itself. 

The invasion bullshit is also stupid. You want me to pay $15 to play a mode that was supposed to be free years ago and is now a halfassed bullshit story mode? Fuck outta here. I mean come on, to buy ONE, just ONE, skin is $10. It's become a corp cashgrab, and a fucking shameless one at that.

Do yourself a favor and play TF2 instead. As someone whos played both a lot of OW2 before the steam port and TF2 since 2016, I can say that TF2 is miles ahead of OW2 as a 15 year old game lmao. MVM is and will always be better than invasion could ever be. 

TL;DR: Fuck OW2 for balance and Blizzard being cockheads directed by suits for money, play a timeless classic like TF2 instead.

Blizzard said they aren't doing the ACTUAL PvE that this game was literally suppose to exist for, and instead asked for more money for half baked cash grab garbage. So I'm not doing the ACTUAL positive review for this game like I was sure I was going to, if the PvE actually existed.

Nothing wrong, they just don't deserve it.

Well...

â€¢	â Made great game, Overwatch 1, sold like candy
â€¢	â Definition of lootbox vulnerable people baiting and exploiting though
â€¢	â The entire market copies it
â€¢	â Fast forward some years everyone is sick of lootboxes
â€¢	â Blizzard inflated the loot pool during the years way too much for you to have a chance to get what you want, so people stopped buying
â€¢	â Blizzard: we have to do something: now we copy the new ripoff modell, battlepass!
â€¢	â Announce Overwatch 2
â€¢	â Community: but why? Blizzard: singleplayer campaign! Wait, no, umm... just coop missions! Skill trees, hero leveling, story!
â€¢	â Release Overwatch 2
â€¢	â No singleplayer mode, no skills, no leveling, no coop missions, multiplayer reduced from 6v6 to 5v5, 90% of the content is the same (all heroes, maps). But they deleted every cosmetic content people had, so now the loot pool it reset, time to cash in battlepass.
â€¢	â Locks new character behind battlepass, despite the core idea of OW being in the past that everyone has access to all for fair gameplay reasons
â€¢	â Literally deletes Overwatch 1 from existence so people cannot go back
â€¢	â Release 0 singleplayer coop content for a year (or two?)
â€¢	â Announce that content has been scrapped entirely. It was the justification why OW2 exists, of course, a few warnedh it's just for moving to BP from boxes. They were of course booood.
â€¢	â 2 weeks later announces they release the scrapped content's half done version... as 15Eur DLC. It's just coop maps that were free events in OW1.

Main gripe with this company is their games always look terrible on my widescreens. I bet they think they are keeping the game balanced by insisting we all use 27 inchs... *hard eye roll* they are so dumb.

The Developers dont even play this game. its just a cash cow for Activision full of greedy... i am uncomfortable writing the rest of that sentence on steam. (starts with R and rhymes with cosby)

6v6 Was better, there was just so many complaints about 6v6 that they thought they could fix it by "simplifying" the game - they did not. The problem is they forgot their own motto - stop nerfing the characters and instead keep buffing everyone. so everyone is just a nerffed clunky mess

Cheaters galore

Smurfs galore

Did i mention the devs dont even play this game? too busy underheel. of Min-Maxing employee cost and content output.

MMR kills this game, they treat it like Chess for a 5v5 game.

Un sueÃ±o hecho realidad tenerlo en steam con logros y comunidad ya que en battle.net no es muy social no hay actividad solo entrabas a jugar no interactuabas, no fan arts nada llamativo, gracias blizz por nada, dejando de lado las plataformas el mismo juego dos no esta tan mal para ser un freetoplay si juegas con amigos es mejor lo juego desde el 2016 de una manera casual y nunca me aburro de hechar alguna partida con mis hÃ©roes favoritos, dale una oportunidad si te gustan lo hero shooters.

i personally would not recommend this game due to some issues i have with it.
One of these issues being the fact that it is constantly laggy for me and i cant do anything cause of the 2 fps i get every other 4 seconds dying to reasons that i could have survived.
the other issue i have is im not having fun playing the game. i still play it to spend time with friends,but im just not having fun.

this is why i don't recommend the game

Its beyond ridiculous how many unethical business practices blizzard has continuously partaken in since this sequel was first announced. its insane how I long in and im told i need to pay extra for the new PVE content with the new invasion bundle. This is a slap in the face to any fan who expected that PVE would be a playable part of the sequel by default, pouring their money into the Battle Pass for five seasons now. Many of my friends have spent up to $50 or more on the Battle Pass alone thinking that this investment would secure them rights to the PVE that they were promised when Overwatch 2 was first announced. This is aside from the fact that the watchpoint pack many purchased before the games release promised PVE content. Overwatch 2 is nothing more then a scam.
